title: Exponential Organizations: Why New Organizations Are Ten Times Better, Faster, Cheaper Than Yours
description: In business, performance is key. In performance, how you organize can be the key to growth. In the past five years, the business world has seen the birth of a new breed of company - the Exponential Organization - that has revolutionized how a company can accelerate its growth by using technology.
author: Salim Ismail
